channel.title: Camera position concept
channel.description:
Well, I merely have the concept so far. I once played a server long ago and the client's camera didn't move slowly over time. It seems unnoticible, but when you take it away it really gives the game a completely different feel. If you can save me the time of finding out how to remove it, please do so since I am new to Java :P But I will find it one way or another ;)
Btw: If you don't know what I am talking about, I am referring to a slow curve in the camera which is normally to avoid macros, although it is easy to make a good anti-random. Just make them type ::turnoffrandom or they die at times :]

item.title: Camera position concept
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:4, topic:313466”][quote author=00zach000 link=topic=409965.msg3025346#msg3025346 date=1257885452]
Why thank you Miss Silab, you’re always so helpful :]

EDIT: Hmm I’m searching for it atm, but having trouble finding it. Any clue what I may be doing wrong?
I am copying single lines and ctrl+f ing them, but it is not finding them :
I’ve tried in 3 clients so far.

EDIT: I tried going through open source clients and searching the .JAVAs, but could not find anything in the code :
I also tried searching for ‘minimap’ in client.java. O,o

I’m going back in. holds breath and jumps
[/quote]
Her code is for a refactored client I believe.[/quote]
Barely, but yes.

@TOPIC - You really didnt search hard, because it took me 5 seconds to figure out what peice would be specific. But here is the non-refactored version.

anInt988++;
if(i >= 0)
aClass19ArrayArrayArray827 = null;
if(anInt988 > 500)
{
anInt988 = 0;
int l1 = (int)(Math.random() * 8D);
if((l1 & 1) == 1)
anInt1278 += anInt1279;
if((l1 & 2) == 2)
anInt1131 += anInt1132;
if((l1 & 4) == 4)
anInt896 += anInt897;
}
if(anInt1278 < -50)
anInt1279 = 2;
if(anInt1278 > 50)
anInt1279 = -2;
if(anInt1131 < -55)
anInt1132 = 2;
if(anInt1131 > 55)
anInt1132 = -2;
if(anInt896 < -40)
anInt897 = 1;
if(anInt896 > 40)
anInt897 = -1;

item.title: Camera position concept
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Thank you for posting such a question, I would of never bothered to remove such a feature.

class: client
method: mainGameProcessor()

find and comment or remove:

        anInt988++;
        if(anInt988 > 500)
        {
            anInt988 = 0;
            int l1 = (int)(Math.random() * 8D);
            if((l1 & 1) == 1)
                anInt1278 += anInt1279;
            if((l1 & 2) == 2)
                anInt1131 += anInt1132;
            if((l1 & 4) == 4)
                anInt896 += anInt897;
        }
        if(anInt1278 < -50)
            anInt1279 = 2;
        if(anInt1278 > 50)
            anInt1279 = -2;
        if(anInt1131 < -55)
            anInt1132 = 2;
        if(anInt1131 > 55)
            anInt1132 = -2;
        if(anInt896 < -40)
            anInt897 = 1;
        if(anInt896 > 40)
            anInt897 = -1;
        anInt1254++;
        if(anInt1254 > 500)
        {
            anInt1254 = 0;
            int i2 = (int)(Math.random() * 8D);
            if((i2 & 1) == 1)
                minimapInt2 += anInt1210;
            if((i2 & 2) == 2)
                minimapInt3 += anInt1171;
        }
        if(minimapInt2 < -60)
            anInt1210 = 2;
        if(minimapInt2 > 60)
            anInt1210 = -2;
        if(minimapInt3 < -20)
            anInt1171 = 1;
        if(minimapInt3 > 10)
            anInt1171 = -1;
